div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1067 Nymphaeum (mod. Geroevka, for- merly Ä–l'tigen), S of Kerch', Crimea oblast, Ukraine, 1952 Burial: c. 300-275 B.C. Contents: 31 AE Panticapaeum: AE (as BMC 17-18 [1], 20 [1], 23 [29]) Disposition: Leningrad To be published by K. Golenko
